channel.title: The Imaginary Road
channel.description: Thoughts, ideas, and stories from the personal and professional life of Michael F. Collins, III.

item.title: Welcome (Back) to The Imaginary Road
item.author: michael-collins
item.description: Welcome back to my personal blog: The Imaginary Road. In this post, I will discuss my break from writing, what has brought me back, and what I plan to write about in the immediate future.
